cms:item.cms:title: Sale of Sundry Items and Publications

cms:textAsset.cms:content:
Miscellaneous

email address herephone number heresms phone number herefax number hereminicom number here

There are a number of publications and sundry items available to buy from the Council.

Should you wish to purchase any of the items listed below, you should:

  • print out the link to online form and fill in your details
  • make your selection from the list and include them on the order form
  • add up the total amount and add enter amount for postage and packaging

Then send a cheque in Pounds Sterling for the total amount including postage and packaging, made payable to "enter council name" to:

enter address

If the item(s) you require are in stock your order will be despatched to you within enter amount working days.
